title: AI Mastermind Challenge
fullDescription: Detailed description for AI Mastermind Challenge. This 16-hour program helps you unlock AI automation, build custom bots, and master 10+ tools. No coding needed. Learn from top AI experts.
benefits: Unlock AI automation secrets, build custom bots, and master 10+ game-changing tools in 16 hours
No coding required—perfect for beginners and professionals alike
Learn from the top 1% in AI with live, expert-led sessions
Hands-on mastery of cutting-edge AI tools like ChatGPT, MidJourney, and Make.com
Automated workflows to save you hours every week and boost your productivity
Custom AI systems: Build GPTs and bots that mirror your style and decision-making
No-code automation skills to create systems that work for you, even offline
Certificate of completion to validate your learnings and hands-on application
targetAudience: 0-2 Years: Early-Career Professionals – Build foundational AI skills and get a head start
2-7 Years: Mid-Career Professionals – Accelerate your growth by mastering AI-driven workflows
7-12 Years: Senior Professionals – Build smarter systems and future-proof your business
12+ Years: Senior Leaders – Leverage AI to optimize processes and empower teams
learningObjectives: Understand Generative AI fundamentals, including Neural Networks and LLMs.
Gain insights into Diffusion Models and their applications.
Master image and video manipulation using MidJourney and Runway ML.
Build and fine-tune Custom GPTs and understand agentic workflows.
Implement AI automations using no-code tools like Make.com.

modules.title: Module 1: Generative AI Fundamentals & Diffusion Models
modules.content: Covers neural networks, NLP/LLM correlation, diffusion concepts, model categories, and an introduction to various AI models.

modules.title: Module 2: Image and Video Manipulation
modules.content: Deep dive into MidJourney (text-to-image, image-to-image, consistent image generation), Runway ML for video, and AI audio generation.

modules.title: Module 3: Building Custom GPTs and Agentic Workflows
modules.content: Focuses on Custom GPT introduction and building, creating AI bots that mimic writing style, fine-tuning, and the future of GenAI with a roadmap to becoming an AI Generalist.

modules.title: Module 4: AI Automations with No-Code
modules.content: Introduction to Make.com, setting up trigger actions, connecting multiple apps with AI, integrating ChatGPT API, and building a first AI workflow.

description: Introduction to the concept of diffusion
Introduction to different proprietary and open-source AI models
Dive into every feature of MidJourney

sessions.session: Building Custom GPTs and Agentic Workflows
description: Build an AI Bot that writes like you
Roadmap to becoming an AI Generalist
Trigger Actions: Automate based on events
Integrate ChatGPT API for conversational capabilities

guarantee: Join for free—no coding experience needed!
certificateInfo: You will receive a certificate of completion to validate your learnings and hands-on experience with cutting-edge AI tools.
testimonials: Diyana: 'This is absolutely insane! No amount of words will express my gratitude for the knowledge shared.'
Chetan Gandhi: 'The sessions were incredibly enlightening and useful. Looking forward to more learning with this amazing community!'
Nikhil Ratakonda: 'Massive thanks to the entire team for over-delivering in today’s Gen AI Mastermind session. Insights and value were next-level—truly exceeded expectations.'

faqs.question: Do I need any coding skills for this challenge?
faqs.answer: No, this Mastermind Challenge is designed to be accessible to everyone, regardless of coding background. We focus on no-code and low-code AI tools.

faqs.question: What are the main outcomes of this Mastermind Challenge?
faqs.answer: You'll gain hands-on experience with tools like ChatGPT, MidJourney, and Make.com, learn to build custom AI bots and automated workflows, and receive a certificate of completion.
